scripts.build:wordlist: ( echo '(function(){'; echo '  "use strict";'; grep -A1100 'const WORD_LIST =' ../src/js/slip39-libs.js | sed '/];/q'; cat ../src/js/base58.js; echo; echo '  window.wordList = window.wordList || {};'; echo '  window.wordList.base58 = BASE58_CHARS;'; echo '  window.wordList.slip39 = WORD_LIST;'; echo '})();' ) > ../src/js/wordlist.js
scripts.build: npm run build:libs && npm run build:wordlist
